meta.title: Dominic Capaci| Software Engineer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing development work and skills

about.bio: I build user-friendly web and mobile apps that solve real problems. With experience at BNY Mellon, Puzzlit, Backstage Technologies, and as a co-founder of Nightspot, I focus on creating accessible, performant products using React, TypeScript, and cloud technologies. I enjoy turning complex challenges into simple, useful experiences that people love to use.
focus: Building accessible, user-centered web and mobile applications with React and TypeScript
Designing scalable front-end architectures and seamless user experiences
Integrating cloud technologies to deliver performant, reliable products

experience.title: Software Engineer (Full-Stack) / UI Designer
experience.description: At Backstage Technologies, I designed and developed key features for a high-traffic ticketing platform, enabling thousands of users to buy, sell, and manage tickets seamlessly. My work directly supported approximately $450,000 in monthly sales by creating intuitive, responsive interfaces and efficient backend integrations.
achievements: Built the Instant Cash ticket flow with React, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL, allowing users to sell tickets in under 2 minutes and driving thousands of monthly transactions.
Designed and implemented the ‚ÄúSell‚Äù landing page using Figma and Tailwind CSS, effectively showcasing core platform features and improving user engagement.
Developed a giveaway system that attracted thousands of users, significantly increasing platform activity and user retention.

experience.title: Software Engineer (Full-Stack)
experience.description: At Puzzlit, I led the development of a layered SVG avatar customization system and a virtual shop, enabling users to personalize their in-app experience and purchase customizations. These features have driven hundreds of purchases in the shop‚Äôs early stages, directly boosting user engagement and monetization.
achievements: Built a performant, layered SVG avatar system allowing for deep user customization and real-time updates.
Designed and implemented a virtual shop with inventory management and optimized asset delivery, supporting secure and efficient purchases.
Developed environment-specific asset management in Firebase Storage, ensuring fast and reliable access to user and shop assets.

experience.title: Co-Founder / Software Engineer (Full-Stack)
experience.description: At Nightspot, I co-founded and engineered a scalable web and mobile application from the ground up, using React JS for dynamic interfaces and MongoDB for flexible NoSQL data management. I collaborated on high-fidelity UI/UX designs in Figma and delivered performant, responsive experiences across both iOS and Android.
achievements: Architected and developed the mobile application in React Native, translating Figma designs into native experiences for multiple platforms.
Built and maintained the web application with React JS and MongoDB, ensuring scalability and dynamic content delivery.
Partnered with the lead graphic designer to iterate on user interface and experience designs, enhancing usability and cross-platform consistency.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: At BNY Mellon, I designed and implemented critical routing architecture for cloud migration projects, enabling independent service availability and scalability across Azure-based Kubernetes environments. I also led the development of a Chrome extension that streamlined debugging and analysis for both test and production environments.
achievements: Built and configured ingress routes and a proxy application in Azure Kubernetes clusters to isolate NetX Investor and NetX Advisor traffic, improving service reliability and scalability.
Developed and deployed a Chrome extension allowing users to manually select traffic routes and override load-balancing protocols, enhancing flexibility in routing and testing.
Integrated real-time network traffic, cookie data, and metrics dashboards into the extension, providing intuitive tools for faster debugging and operational insight.

education.degree: B.S in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics
